import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Descriptions } from 'antd' import {Collapse, Divider, Row, Col} from "antd" const { Panel } = Collapse; const Purches = () => { const [purches, setPurches] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const getPurch = async () => { const requestOptions = { method: "GET" } return await fetch("/api/Client", requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then( (data) => { console.log('Data:', data) setPurches(data) }, (error) => { console.log(error) } ) } getPurch() }, [setPurches]) return ( Zhou Maomao 1810000000 Hangzhou, Zhejiang No. 18, Wantang Road, Xihu District, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China empty {/*
{purches.map(({ id, fullName, driverLicense, pasport, date, price, accessName, modelName}) => (

*/} {/*

{fullName}

{driverLicense}

*/} ) } export default Purches
